    • Method Detail

      • getAdID

        public String getAdID()
        Fetch the id of this VASTAd. This doesn't really mean anything.
        Returns:
        the id of this VASTAd.

      • getSystem

        public String getSystem()
        Fetch the VASTAd's System. This is a String defining which ad provider this VASTAd uses.
        Returns:
        the VASTAd's System.

      • getSystemVersion

        public String getSystemVersion()
        Fetch the VASTAd's System's Version.
        Returns:
        the version of the VASTAd's System.

        Fetch the description of this VASTAd.

      • getErrorURLs

        public List<String> getErrorURLs()
        Fetch the list of URLs to ping when this VASTAd throws an error.
        Returns:
        the list of URls to ping when this VASTAd throws an error.

      • getImpressionURLs

        public List<String> getImpressionURLs()
        Fetch the list of URLs to ping when this VASTAd plays.
        Returns:
        the list of URLs to ping when this VASTAd plays.

      • getSequence

        public List<VASTSequenceItem> getSequence()
        Fetch the list of VASTSequenceItem objects that make up this VASTAd. This list defines the order to play or show the various different VASTAd types such as linear, non-linear and companion ads.
        Returns:
        the list of VASTSequenceItem objects.

      • getExtensions

        public Element getExtensions()
        Fetch the raw XML Element object for the VAST Extensions associated with this VASTAd.
        Returns:
        the Element object containing the VAST Extensions.
